001package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
002
003import static imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.StandardIlluminant.D50;
004import static imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.StandardIlluminant.D65;
005
006import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
007
008public class XYZ65ColorSpace extends CustomColorSpace {
009        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
010        
011        private static final ChromaticAdaptation catD65toD50 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D65, D50);
012        private static final ChromaticAdaptation catD50toD65 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D50, D65);
013
014        
015        private static final XYZ65ColorSpace instance = new XYZ65ColorSpace();
016        public static XYZ65ColorSpace getInstance() {
017                return instance;
018        }
019
020        private XYZ65ColorSpace() {
021                super(TYPE_XYZ, 3);
022        }
023
024        // ----------------------------------------------------
025
026        @Override       // convert this D65.based XYZ to sRGB 
027        public double[] toRGB(double[] thisXYZ65) {
028                double[] XYZ50 = this.toCIEXYZ(thisXYZ65);      // could be done directly!!
029                sRgbColorSpace srgbCS = sRgbColorSpace.getInstance();
030                double[] srgb = srgbCS.fromCIEXYZ(XYZ50);
031                return srgb;
032        }
033
034        @Override
035        public double[] fromRGB(double[] srgb) {
036                sRgbColorSpace srgbCS = sRgbColorSpace.getInstance();
037                double[] XYZ50 = srgbCS.toCIEXYZ(srgb);
038                return this.fromCIEXYZ(XYZ50);
039        }
040        
041        // -------------------------------------------------
042        
043        @Override       // convert this CS D65 XYZ to standard D50 XYZ
044        public double[] toCIEXYZ(double[] thisXYZ65) {
045                return catD65toD50.applyTo(thisXYZ65);
046        }
047        
048        @Override       // convert standard D50 XYZ to this CS D65 XYZ
049        public double[] fromCIEXYZ(double[] XYZ50) {
050                return catD50toD65.applyTo(XYZ50);
051        }
052
053}
